channel.title: sublime on 苏苏的博客
channel.description: Recent content in sublime on 苏苏的博客

item.title: Sublime使用和设置
item.description: 配置文件 最喜欢的字体Monaco,此处下载 配置文件 Preferences.sublime-settings { "close_windows_when_empty": true, "default_encoding": "UTF-8", "default_line_ending": "unix", "folder_exclude_patterns": [ ".svn", ".git", ".hg", "CVS", "node_modules" ], "font_face": "Monaco", "font_size": 14, "highlight_line": true, "highlight_modified_tabs": true, "ignored_packages": [ "Vintage" ], "show_encoding": true, "show_line_endings": true, "tab_size": 4, "translate_tabs_to_spaces": false, "update_check": false, "word_wrap": false } 插件 open_browser.py 插件 import sublime, sublime_plugin import webbrowser import os url_map = { 'D:\\git\\bbs\\' : 'http://127.0.0.3/', 'D:\\php\\su\\' : 'http://127.0.0.2/', 'D:\\php\\htdocs\\' : 'http://127.0.0.1/' } class OpenBrowserCommand(sublime_plugin.
